database.name: ArrayExpress
database.description: ArrayExpress Archive of Functional Genomics Data stores data from high-throughput functional genomics experiments, and provides these data for reuse to the research community.

entry.name: Transcription profiling of Arabidopsis distal leaves directly exposed to and shaded from high light levels
entry.description: Effect of high light on directly exposed and shaded, distal Arabidopsis leaf tissue

additional_fields.field: Nucleic Acid Extraction - Trizol extraction protocol

Assay Data Transformation - ID_REF =
VALUE = fluorescence intensity
ABS_CALL = presence or absence call
DETECTION P-VALUE = confidence in precense call Feature Extraction - To identify differentially-expressed genes during acute GVHD versus recovery phase, the raw signal intensity data were processed as follows.

entry.name: Transcription profiling of Arabidopsis shoots, roots and cell cultures
entry.description: Microarray analysis of the changes in transcript abundance in cell culture and shoot

additional_fields.field: Nucleic Acid Extraction - Trizol extraction protocol

Assay Data Transformation - ID_REF =
VALUE = fluorescence intensity
ABS_CALL = presence or absence call
DETECTION P-VALUE = confidence in precense call Feature Extraction - To identify differentially-expressed genes during acute GVHD versus recovery phase, the raw signal intensity data were processed as follows.

entry.name: Transcription profiling of wild type and transgenic 35S:PAR1-GG Arabidopsis seedlings
entry.description: Transcription profiling of wild type and transgenic 35S:PAR1-GG seedlings. To characterize the transcriptional networks altered by constitutive overexpression of PAR1 in seedlings, using two-color long-oligonucleotide microarrays.

additional_fields.field: Nucleic Acid Extraction - Trizol extraction protocol

VALUE = fluorescence intensity
ABS_CALL = presence or absence call
DETECTION P-VALUE = confidence in precense call Feature Extraction - To identify differentially-expressed genes during acute GVHD versus recovery phase, the raw signal intensity data were processed as follows.
